One of my favorite stops in Barcelona!My last night in Spain was spent nibbling on delicious food on their pleasant little terrace.  A great bottle of wine coupled with a gourmet salad, hamburger, and fries.I only remember the hamburger to be honest.  No bun.  Just meat and cheese.  The meat had those great crispy edges...oh man.We sat on the terrace and people-watched as the sun went down in my favorite neighborhood.I would love to got back (duh) and sit at the bar next time.  Just for a different view.  And to go back to Barcelona.
